title: The schema should be included as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using a stored procedure
description: When using a stored procedure, the schema name should be included as 'schemaname.Procedurename'. Currently, it is not being added.
OB: In the 'Edit data set' window, drag a stored procedure to the Query Text field. The expected result is that the stored procedure name should be composed of the database schema name and the stored procedure name.
SR:
1. Modify the code to include the schema name when using a stored procedure.
2. Update the 'Edit data set' window to display the schema name along with the stored procedure name.
